channel.title: Need a Backup.bat Please!
channel.description:
Upload it on a site and post link here please!
Thanks.

item.title: Need a Backup.bat Please!
item.dc:creator: @ajs47951 ajs47951
item.description:
@ajs47951 wrote:

here

@echo off
@title Client Backup Creator

:0
echo This program will create a backup of your client.
pause
goto 1

:1
cls
echo Generating backup…
mkdir “Backup Client”
cd …
copy .\Client .\Backup\Backup Client
cls
goto 2

:2
echo Backup client created.
pause
exit

and here

@echo off
@title Server Backup Creator

:0
echo This program will create a backup of your server.
pause
goto 1

:1
cls
echo Generating backup…
mkdir “Backup Server”
cd …
copy .\Server .\Backup\Backup Server
cls
goto 2

:2
echo Backup server created.
pause
exit

Read full topic
